title: Plate
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Organic, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Features natural, organic, and whole food. Menu has meat and fish with several vegetarian choices, a few of which can be made vegan upon request. Has a vegetable salad, quesadilla, a garden burger, a grilled tofu and veggies sandwich, and anther salad option with tofu. Brown rice and steamed organic vegetable available as side orders. Note that the french fries are cooked in the same fryer as meat. Causal dining space with natural lighting and simple, contemporary decor. Located in the same plaza as PC Greens health food store.
